title: Southpoint serif font
content: Can anyone ID the font used here. Best art I have to work from, sorry. ![southpt](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604051902im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70946.jpg)
author: evan

comments.content: This is an odd one. The n's are not identical, nor are the o's. I think it might have started as a Dutch font like Jason.

Looks a bit like [Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604051902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/baskerville/roman/testdrive.html?s=Southpoint+business+park&p=36), maybe several generations removed from the original setting.
